#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int x[1002],y[1002],d[1002];
bool vis[1002];
int main() {
    int n, e, i, u, v, w, start,t,final;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(int i=0;i<n+1;i++){
        scanf("%d %d",&x[i],&y[i]);
        d[i]=(x[i]*x[i])+(y[i]*y[i]);
    }
    int mi,mini=INT_MAX,smi;
    for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
        if(mini>d[i]){
            mini=d[i];
            mi=i;
        }
    }
    while(1){
        mini=INT_MAX;
        vis[mi]=1;
        if(mi==n){
            printf("%d\n",d[n]);
            break;
        }
        for(int i=0;i<n+1;i++){
            if(!vis[i]){
                d[i]=min(d[i],d[mi]+(x[i]-x[mi])*(x[i]-x[mi]) + (y[i]-y[mi])*(y[i]-y[mi]));
                if(d[i]<mini){
                    mini=d[i];
                    smi=i;
                }
            }
        }
        mi=smi;
    }
    return 0;
}
